longBusinessSummary: The fund invests mainly in U.S. stocks, with an emphasis on companies that are considered to have prospects for rapid earnings growth. It does not focus on companies of any particular size, however; the advisor may emphasize mid-cap stocks. The fund's investment advisor uses fundamental research to identify stocks that are expected to outperform the market over a three- to five-year time horizon and that are available at attractive prices relative to their fundamental values.
